item.title: Using VMware.Sdk.Nsx.Policy: Commands for NSX
item.description: VCF PowerCLI 9.0 now includes a module called VMware.Sdk.Nsx.Policy, this modules contains auto-generated cmdlets to support NSX Policy Public APIs. Use can use this post as a quick reference guide. Connecting to a NSX Instance with Local Credentials Start a PowerShell session. Connect to a NSX instance using local credentials by running the following command: 1Connect-NsxServer -Server sfo-m01-nsx01.sfo.rainpole.io -User admin -Password VMw@re1!VMw@re1! Once connected the following information is stored in $defaultNsxConnections.
